story.kicker_image_caption: Virat Kohli and Abhishek Bachchan during the celebrity football match between All Heart Football Club and All Star Football Club in New Delhi on March 30, 2013. (PHOTO: Pankaj Nangia | Mail Today)
story.storykicker: Apart from Virat Kohli and MS Dhoni, some of the country's top cricketers like Zaheer Khan, Harbhajan Singh, Yuvraj Singh, Ajinkya Rahane and Ravichandran Ashwin will also be playing the match against Abhishek Bachchan-led Bollywood team.
story.storybody:
Fans will witness an exciting battle between India's Test skipper Virat Kohli-led cricket stars and Abhishek Bachchan-led Bollywood celebrities in a charity football match on Saturday.

The match, termed as "Celebrity Classico 2016", will take place at the Mumbai Football Arena, Andheri Sports Complex, to generate funds for charitable initiatives in which Kohli and Bachchan are involved.

Virat will lead the All Heart Football Club, a property of The Virat Kohli Foundation. Bachchan is set to lead All Stars Football Club, run by his Playing for Humanity charitable organisation, in the match.

Apart from Kohli and India's limited overs skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni, some of the country's top cricketers like Zaheer Khan, Harbhajan Singh, Yuvraj Singh, Ajinkya Rahane and Ravichandran Ashwin will also be playing in the match.

Bachchan's team will include the likes of movie stars Ranbir Kapoor, Arjun Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapoor and celebrated director Shoojit Sircar, among others.
story.magazinekicker: Apart from Virat Kohli and MS Dhoni, some of the country's top cricketers like Zaheer Khan, Harbhajan Singh, Yuvraj Singh, Ajinkya Rahane and Ravichandran Ashwin will also be playing the match against Abhishek Bachchan-led Bollywood team.
story.shortheadline: Kohli, Dhoni to play charity football match against Bollywood stars
